data.title: Rolo Tomassi, Cryptodira, The Callous Daoboys tour dates
data.meta_description: Rolo Tomassi will headline a September tour of the East Coast with support from Cryptodira and The Callous Daoboys. Here are the dates:9/1 Boston, MA @ Brighton Music Hall9/2 Philadelphia, PA @ Milkboy9/3 Syracuse, ...
data.text:
Rolo Tomassi will headline a September tour of the East Coast with support from Cryptodira and The Callous Daoboys. Here are the dates:

9/1 Boston, MA @ Brighton Music Hall

9/2 Philadelphia, PA @ Milkboy

9/3 Syracuse, NY @ Lost Horizon

9/4 Pittsburgh, PA @ Crafthouse (no The Callous Daoboys)

9/6 Grand Rapids, MI @ The Pyramid Scheme

9/7 Chicago, IL @ Beat Kitchen (no The Callous Daoboys)

9/9 Columbus, OH @ Big Room Bar

9/10 Nashville, TN @ The End

9/11 Atlanta, GA @ The Masquerade

9/12 Orlando, FL @ Wills Pub

9/13 Columbia, SC @ New Brookland Tavern

9/14 Baltimore, MD @ Metro Gallery

9/15 Brooklyn, NY @ The Meadows

Search for tours coming to your city here.
